aprendeshop_tasks_title: As part of the team, I collaborated on:
aprendeshop_task_1: Developing responsive UI components with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap
aprendeshop_task_2: Building backend functionality with Java and Spring Boot

improve_description: Improvements based on user stories, applying Universal Design principles and user-centered approach to optimize the Birdman site experience. The redesign aims for clearer navigation, visually harmonious and inclusive. I’m currently iterating the project to refine interaction, accessibility, and overall visual coherence.
modal_birdman_story_1: As a user, I want to easily browse the products and distinguish each protein visually.
modal_birdman_story_2: As a visitor, I want the color palette and visuals to reflect each bird’s essence, strengthening brand recall.
modal_birdman_story_3: As a user with different devices, I need an accessible, responsive, and visually coherent interface.
odoo_description: Web mockup built with Bootstrap, SCSS, and a focus on desktop viewports (≥992px). It was created as part of a technical interview assessment to demonstrate skills in modern layout development, SCSS variable management, project organization best practices and using figma AI.
mapping_description: This case study documents the mapping process behind the redesign of a minimal, modern e-commerce experience. Using Figma, the core elements of the user journey to identify friction points, clarify decision paths, and improve the flow from browsing to checkout.
mapping_conclution: Each section highlights a different layer of the experience from user actions and emotions, to frontstage interactions, backstage processes, and design opportunities. Understanding how users move through an experience and how to redesign a flow with clarity and intention. This structured supports better decisions, clearer navigation, and a more intuitive shopping experience overall.
